author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: To quote Victor Bergeron, "You know that adios means good-bye. You drink two or three of these, and it's adios, believe me, it's adios."
name: Adios Amigos Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
